elements.name: When a POST body containing valid authorization information and necessary data
elements.description:
(title, coupon_code, coupon_type, start_date, end_date, discount, discount_type, minimum_shopping, maximum_discount, is_expire, is_multiple_buy)
  is sent to the /api/coupon/couponAdd endpoint, the returned status code should be 201,
  and the message information in the response body should be verified as "coupon added successfully".

steps.name: The api user constructs the base url with the "admin" token.
The api user sets "api/coupon/couponAdd" path parameters
The api user prepares a POST request containing the "Coupon Ekleme 001" "attemt" 07 "2024-04-10" "2024-06-10" 35 0 1 5 0 1 information to send to the api coupon CouponAdd endpoint.
The api user sends the POST request and saves the response returned from the api coupon CouponAdd endpoint.
The api user verifies that the status code is 201
The api user verifies that the message information in the response body is "coupon added successfully"

name: As an administrator, I want to be able to create a new coupon record via the API connection.
